intent_atoms.description: Surface tolerant parsing issue badges in the outline so operators can immediately spot corrupt structures.
The system must always display corruption badges for tree view nodes when a tolerant parsing issue is detected.
Badges appear correctly in the outline and are visible to operators.

functional_units.name: Corruption Badges for Tree View Nodes
functional_units.description: Displays surface‑tolerant parsing issue badges in the outline view to allow operators to spot corrupt structures immediately.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verifies that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware, ensuring VoiceOver accessibility shortcuts work correctly.

functional_units.name: Real‑World Asset Licensing and Integration
functional_units.description: Secures licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads in regression baselines with real-world assets.
